title: Oakland: Four hospitalized after shooting
content:
OAKLAND — Police in Oakland are investigating a shooting Thursday night that sent four people to the hospital.
Officers with the Oakland Police Department responded at 10:08 p.m. to a shooting in the 1600 block of 7th Street and learned four people had been shot.
The victims, identified as three men and one woman, were transported to the hospital.
No other information on the incident was immediately available.
